In England, in the seven days to 23 August, there were 187,302 new confirmed cases (331.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 16 August, there were 178,269 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 5% (9,033 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 28 August is 5,816,071 (10,284.8 cases per 100,000 population).
